item.title: Anna add a quote by Phedre no Delaunay de Montreve
item.description: "When Love cast me out, it was Cruelty who took pity upon me." -- Phedre no Delaunay de Montreve

item.title: Anna add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Just because you can doesn't mean you should." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Anna add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Anna add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "Tink's a Disneyland whore!"-Jenks" -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Anna add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Anna add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "The world is quiet here." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Anna add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Anna add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Winter is coming." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The scar had not pained Harry for nineteen years. All was well." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Anna add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Oh, gods, you’re mated! I really hope it’s to Aimee. (Bride) Thankfully so. Otherwise I’d have had to kill me some ho and then beat Fang senseless. (Aimee)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "If people were like rain, I was like drizzle and she was a hurricane." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by George Gordon Byron
item.description: "And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on." -- George Gordon Byron

item.title: Anna add a quote by Bram Stoker
item.description: "Listen to them, the children of the night. What music they make!" -- Bram Stoker

item.title: Anna add a quote by Christopher Marlowe
item.description: "Make me immortal with a kiss." -- Christopher Marlowe

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R. R. Martin
item.description: "There is only one god and his name is Death. And there is only one thing we say to Death: “Not today." -- George R. R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "They can keep their heaven. When I die, I’d sooner go to Middle Earth. " -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Anna add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Anna add a quote by Esther Earl
item.description: "The measure of a friendship is not its physicality but its significance. Good friendships, online or off, urge us toward empathy; they give us comfort and also pull us out of the prisons of our selves." -- Esther Earl

item.title: Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Some infinities are bigger than other infinities." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Anna add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "How do you pick up the threads of an old life? How do you go on, when in your heart, you begin to understand, there is no going back? There are some things that time cannot mend. Some hurts that go too deep...that have taken hold." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Anna add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "The hardest thing in this world, is to live in it." -- Joss Whedon
